description: This file serves as the server-side rendering entry point for a Qwik-based web application, handling rendering outside the browser for different environments like server, Cloudflare, etc. It imports rendering functions, manifest, and a root component, and exports a default function that renders the application with configurable options.

methods.name: default
methods.description: Main server entry function that renders the React component <Root /> to a stream, applying provided rendering options and container/server data configurations.
